Name: MyCarta
AboutMe:
I am a Geophysicists from Canada.

I have a Honors degree in Geology from the University of Rome, Italy, and a Masters degree in Geophysics from the University of Calgary, Alberta.

I am also an amateur researcher with my own company, MyCarta, which is involved in research in visualisation and digital mapping of geoscience data. I like to explore methods from other disciplines (for example Image Processing) and adapt them to Geoscience data.

On my blog MyCarta I write about geophysical exploration methods (both seismic and non seismic), particularly data enhancement, visualization and interpretation, as well as image processing.

I am also passionate about human exploration of the Solar System.
